polyline.style: stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke: black; stroke-width: 12; fill: none;
stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: black; stroke-width: 12; fill: none;
stroke-linejoin: bevel; stroke-width: 12; stroke: black; fill: none;

circle.style: stroke: black; stroke-width: 1.5; fill: blue; fill-opacity: 0.6
